subject: Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Christian Taylor of the United States produced a personal best in the triple jump to upset the defending world champion Phillips Idowu of Britain on a good day for American athletes at the Crystal Palace Diamond League meet in London.
snippet: Christian Taylor of the United States produced a personal best in the triple jump to upset the defending world champion Phillips Idowu of Britain on a good day for American athletes at the Crystal Palace Diamond League meet in London.
